mapper.insert:
insert ignore into OMS_ORDER_2
APPLY_DATE, CUST_NO, ORDER_ID, LINE_NO, LINE_RECORD, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE,
#{item.applyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lineNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.lineRecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE UPDATE_DATE = NOW()
